subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ruben Tejada, who emerged as the Mets’ future shortstop in 2012, before struggling with injuries and inconsistency, has steadily regained his old form at the plate this season.
snippet: Ruben Tejada, who emerged as the Mets’ future shortstop in 2012, before struggling with injuries and inconsistency, has steadily regained his old form at the plate this season.
